lead_paragraph: A Justice Department report showing that officers systematically stopped, searched and arrested blacks is a step toward a settlement to overhaul police training and practices.

headline.print_headline: Police Bias Found in Baltimore, and Many Ask What Took So Long
headline.main: Findings of Police Bias in Baltimore Validate What Many Have Long Felt

snippet: A Justice Department report showing that officers systematically stopped, searched and arrested blacks is a step toward a settlement to overhaul police training and practices....
abstract: Many black residents of Baltimore react with rage and skepticism to scathing report by Justice Dept about city's police force and its discriminatory policing tactics; many wonder why it took so long for biased practices that they have long experienced personally to be exposed.
